DOC.brief_title: Sustained Effect Urticaria Remission With Relatively High Dose Vitamin D Supplementation After Omalizumab Discontinuation
DOC.criteria: Physician diagnose chronic urticaria Currently receive omalizumab therapy treatment chronic idiopathic urticaria well control USS < 25 Not capable informed consent . Not capable answer questionnaire . Subjects pure physical urticaria . Pregnant lactating woman . Subjects hypercalcemia ( calcium > 10.3 mg/dl ) renal insufficiency ( GFR < 50 ml/min ) . Subjects prior anaphylaxis omalizumab . Currently take high dose vitamin D supplementation . Prior high dose vitamin D supplementation urticaria failure . Baseline 25 ( OH ) D > 80 ng/ml Subjects sarcoidosis , hyperparathyroidism , histoplasmosis , lymphoma tuberculosis
